title: Ep. 83 - Barbarian's Mate by Ruby Dixon (Ice Planet Barbarians #7)
itunes:title: Ep. 83 - Barbarian's Mate by Ruby Dixon (Ice Planet Barbarians #7)
description:
Hey HB's! We've got more Melody catnip: alien erotic romance! We're talking about  Barbarian's Mate, the 7th installment of the Ice Planet Barbarians series. We've got Josie, the last of the original women to resonate, and Haeden, the grumpiest 7 foot blue alien a girl could ask for. But dudes! He's not grumpy! He's a secret cinnamon roll who just can't stop spilling in his loin cloth! This duke is a virgin and he's the virgin duke of her secret dreams. 
 Bonus Content: 
 Potty training, our humble comments on the title (get @ us authors, we offer our services to all), new segment transition: *Beep Boop Bird Click*, IUD hijinks, taking someone to your FURS, faking farts to hide your true love, luxury caves, lady nectar, heavy balls, spurs, sexy papoose, and how to not be a Romeo. 
 Lady Loves: 
 Erin: Maybelline Super Stay Matte in Self Starter (which she now concedes is the best lipstick on the market)
 Melody: Make good choices for yourself, like not furtively eating frosting with a spoon like a Gollum.
 For tons of bonus content, shout outs, and gifts, check out our PATREON!
 Patreon Shout Out: 
 Whitney J. You are descended from Poseidon. Just like the god of the sea, horses, and earthquakes, you know how to juggle everything within your domain to perfection. You possess the depth and power of the sea, with a good sense of when to go with the flow. You have the loyalty, dependability, and high spirit of the fastest steed. And you have not only the wisdom and foresight to know when things need to be shaken up, but the courage to follow through. You love boundlessly and are fearsome when defending your domain.
  
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
